nodes.name: Sirius Black
nodes.bio: Best friend of James Potter and godfather of Harry.

nodes.name: Lavender Brown
nodes.bio: Killed by a werewolf. She was a gryffindor student who dated Ron.

nodes.name: Cho Chang
nodes.bio: Ravenclaw student who dated Cedric Diggory and Harry Potter.

nodes.name: Vincent Crabbe
nodes.bio: Slytherin student who was best friends with Goyle and followed Draco.

nodes.name: Bartemius "Barty" Crouch Jr.
nodes.bio: Death Eater who impersonated Alastor Moody.

nodes.name: Fleur Delacour
nodes.bio: Participated in the Triwizard tournament and married Bill Weasley.

nodes.name: Cedric Diggory
nodes.bio: Participated in the Triwizard tournament and got killed by Voldemort.

nodes.name: Alberforth Dumbledore
nodes.bio: Albus' brother and owner of Hog's Head.

nodes.name: Albus Dumbledore
nodes.bio: Headmaster of Hogwards killed by Snape.

nodes.name: Dudley Dursley
nodes.bio: Muggle son of Vernon and Petunia and first-cousin of Harry.

nodes.name: Petunia Dursley
nodes.bio: Harry's aunt and sister of Lily.

nodes.name: Vernon Dursley
nodes.bio: Harry's muggle uncle.

nodes.name: Argus Filch
nodes.bio: Squib caretake of Hogwards.

nodes.name: Seamus Finnigan
nodes.bio: Harry's friend and member of Dumbledore's army.

nodes.name: Nicolas Flamel
nodes.bio: Creator of the Philosopher's Stone.

nodes.name: Cornelius Fudge
nodes.bio: Minister of Magic that was forced to resign.

nodes.name: Gregory Goyle
nodes.bio: Best friend of Crabbe. Slytherin student and dies by falling into Fiendfyre.

nodes.name: Hermione Granger
nodes.bio: One of Harry's best friend and marries Ron Weasley.

nodes.name: Rubeus Hagrid
nodes.bio: Half-giant who loves Harry. He was the keeper of Keys and Grounds at Hogwards.

nodes.name: Viktor Krum
nodes.bio: Participant in the Triwizard tournament. Dated Hermione.

nodes.name: Bellatrix Lestrange
nodes.bio: Death Eater who was killed by Molly Weasley.

nodes.name: Neville Longbottom
nodes.bio: Gryffindor student who was a member of Dumbledore's army.

nodes.name: Luna Lovegood
nodes.bio: Ravenclaw student who was a member of Dumbledore's army.

nodes.name: Remus Lupin
nodes.bio: Friend of James Potter and werewolf. He married Nymphadora.

nodes.name: Draco Malfoy
nodes.bio: Slytherin student who had many arguments with Harry.

nodes.name: Lucius Malfoy
nodes.bio: Father of Draco and influential Death-Eater.

nodes.name: Olympe Maxime
nodes.bio: Half-giantess and headmistress of Beauxbatons.

nodes.name: Minerva McGonagall
nodes.bio: Professor of Transfiguration and head of Gryffindor.

nodes.name: Alastor "Mad-Eye" Moody
nodes.bio: Retired auror and member of the order of the Phoenix. Killed by Voldemort.

nodes.name: Peter Pettigrew
nodes.bio: Betrays James and Lily Potter. Follower of Voldemort.

nodes.name: Harry Potter
nodes.bio: The boy who lived. Main character of the series.

nodes.name: James Potter
nodes.bio: Father of Harry. Murdered by Voldemort.

nodes.name: Lily Potter
nodes.bio: Mother of Harry. Murdered by Voldemort.

nodes.name: Quirinus Quirrell
nodes.bio: Possessed by Voldemort. Defence against the Dark Arts professor.

nodes.name: Lord Voldemort
nodes.bio: The antagonist of the series who murdered many.

nodes.name: Rita Skeeter
nodes.bio: Reporter at the Daily Prophet.

nodes.name: Severus Snape
nodes.bio: Head of the Slytherin house and saved Harry in many occasions.

nodes.name: Dolores Janes Umbridge
nodes.bio: Senior undersecretary to the Ministry of Magic. Eventually sent to Azkaban.

nodes.name: Arthur Weasley
nodes.bio: Father of the Weasleys and member of the Order of the Phoenix.

nodes.name: Bill Weasley
nodes.bio: Oldest son of Arthur and Molly. Husband of Fleur.

nodes.name: Charlie Weasley
nodes.bio: Second son of Arthur and Molly. Works with dragons in Romania.

nodes.name: Fred Weasley
nodes.bio: Identical twin with George and co-owner of Weasleys' Wizard Wheezes

nodes.name: George Weasley
nodes.bio: Identical twin with Fred and co-owner of Weasleys' Wizard Wheezes

nodes.name: Ginny Weasley
nodes.bio: Marries Harry Potter and only daughter of Molly and Arthur.

nodes.name: Molly Weasley
nodes.bio: Wife of Arthur and mother of the Weasleys. Kills Bellatrix.

nodes.name: Percy Weasley
nodes.bio: Third son of Arthur and Molly. He is a Gryffindor prefect.

nodes.name: Ron Weasley
nodes.bio: Harry's best friend. Marries Hermione.

nodes.name: Dobby
nodes.bio: House elf and friend of Harry. He is killed by Bellatrix.

nodes.name: Fluffy
nodes.bio: Three-headed dog belonging to Rubeus Hagrid.

nodes.name: Hedwig
nodes.bio: Harry's owl.

nodes.name: Moaning Myrtle
nodes.bio: Ghost at Hogwards.

nodes.name: Aragog
nodes.bio: Acromantula belonging to Rubeus Hagrid.

nodes.name: Grawp
nodes.bio: Giant-half brother of Hagrid.
